greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of sets of lists with distinct list sizes, cf. A000262.
comment: a(n) also enumerates ordered pairs of permutation functions on n elements where f(g(x)) = g(g(f(x))). - _Chad Brewbaker_, Mar 27 2014
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
mathematica: nn = 19; Drop[ Range[0, nn]! CoefficientList[ Series[ Product[1 + x^i, {i, 1, nn}], {x, 0, nn}], x], 0] (* _Geoffrey Critzer_, Aug 05 2013 *)
nmax = 20; CoefficientList[Series[Product[1/(1-x^(2*k-1)), {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x] * Range[0, nmax]! (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 19 2015 *)
xref: Cf. A007838, A007837. Other ordered permutation function pair relations are A000012, A000085, A000142, A053529, A001044.
results.author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Nov 05 2003
ext: Mathematica program adapted to new offset by _Vincenzo Librandi_, Mar 28 2014
